resources.string:
Phone Number:
  The default mode, the regex will match the phone number.

Contacts:
  The regex will match the contact name associated with the incoming number.
  - A use case:
  Block all non-contacts at weekend with regex `.*`.

Contact Group:
  The regex will match the contact group name associated with the incoming number, impacting all the contacts in that group, so you don\'t need to add them individually, and no need to update it even when there are personnel changes.
  - A use case:
  Block all coworkers at weekend by blocking the contact group "work".
Text too long, editing is disabled
Individual duration for each app, when left empty, it will fall back to the global duration.
